pkgmetadata.longdescription: Sparse-Group SLOPE: Adaptive Bi-Level Selection with FDR Control // Implementation of Sparse-group SLOPE (SGS) (Feser and Evangelou (2023) doi:10.48550/arXiv.2305.09467) models. Linear and logistic regression models are supported, both of which can be fit using k-fold cross-validation. Dense and sparse input matrices are supported. In addition, a general adaptive three operator splitting (ATOS) implementation is provided. Group SLOPE (gSLOPE) (Brzyski et al. (2019) doi:10.1080/01621459.2017.1411269) models are also implemented. Both gSLOPE and SGS are available with strong screening rules (Feser and Evangelou (2024) doi:10.48550/arXiv.2405.15357) for computational speed-up.
